Sentencas: In co-ionic conducting solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), both oxygen ion (O2-) and proton (H+) can transport through the electrolyte, generating steam in both the anode and cathode.
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: Thus the mass transport phenomenon in the electrodes is quite different from that in conventional SOFC with oxygen ion conducting electrolyte (O-SOFC) or with proton conducting electrolyte (H-SOFC).
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: The generation of steam in both electrodes also affects the concentration over-potential loss and further the SOFC performance.
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: However, no detailed modeling study on SOFCs with co-ionic electrolyte has been reported yet.
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: In this paper, a new mathematical model for SOFC based on co-ionic electrolyte was developed to predict its actual performance considering three major kinds of overpotentials.
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: Ohm's law and the Butler-Volmer formula were used to model the ion conduction and electrochemical reactions, respectively.
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: The dusty gas model (DGM) was employed to simulate the mass transport processes in the porous electrodes.
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: Parametric simulations were performed to investigate the effects of proton transfer number (t(H)) and current density (j(total)) on the cell performance.
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: It is interesting to find that the co-ionic conducting SOFC could perform better than O-SOFC and H-SOFC by choosing an appropriate proton transfer number.
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: In addition, the co-ionic SOFC shows smaller difference between the anode and cathode concentration overpotentials than O-SOFC and H-SOFC at certain t(H) values.
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte

Sentencas: The results could help material selection for enhancing SOFC performance.
Titulo: Mathematical analysis of SOFC based on co-ionic conducting electrolyte
